typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	partdistFrom as string
}
source(output(
		statecode as string,
		statuscode as string,
		ntt_breathingspacetypeid as string,
		createdon as string,
		ntt_debtorid as string,
		ownerid as string,
		modifiedon as string,
		ntt_activeregister as string,
		ntt_triggerpointofcontactsubmitnotification as string,
		modifiedby as string,
		ntt_referencenumber as string,
		ntt_triggerdebtorsubmitnotification as string,
		createdby as string,
		ntt_breathingspacestatusid as string,
		owningbusinessunit as string,
		ntt_breathingspacemoratoriumid as string,
		ntt_name as string,
		owninguser as string,
		ntt_midwayquestionanswer as string,
		ntt_commencementdate as string,
		ntt_retentionperiodenddate as string,
		ntt_retentionperiodstartdate as string,
		ntt_closuredate as string,
		ntt_submissiondate as string,
		ntt_activeregisterperiodstartdate as string,
		ntt_parentcancellationreasonid as string,
		ntt_expirydate as string,
		ntt_activeregisterperiodenddate as string,
		ntt_midwayquestionrequired as string,
		intBatchId as integer,
		partdist as date,
		ntt_mhreviewquestionrequired as string,
		ntt_managingmoneyadviserorganisationid as string,
		ntt_createdfromapi as string,
		ntt_mhreviewquestionanswer as string,
		blIsValid as boolean,
		tsCreatedOn as timestamp,
		tsModifiedOn as timestamp,
		tsNTTActiveRegisterPeriodStartDate as timestamp,
		strNTTBreathingSpaceMoratoriumId as string,
		strNTTBreathingSpaceStatusId as string,
		strNTTBreathingSpaceTypeId as string,
		strNTTChildCancellationReasonId as string,
		tsNTTClosureDate as timestamp,
		tsNTTCommencementDate as timestamp,
		blNTTCreatedFromAPI as boolean,
		strNTTDebtorId as string,
		tsNTTExpiryDate as timestamp,
		strNTTManagingMoneyAdviserOrganisationId as string,
		strNTTParentCancellationReasonId as string,
		tsNTTRemovedFromRegisterDate as timestamp,
		tsNTTSubmissionDate as timestamp,
		blNTTActiveRegister as boolean,
		blIsTruncate as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'curation',
	folderPath: 'ods/bss/dynamics/moratoriums/breathingspacemoratorium') ~> sourceODS
source(output(
		bst_pk_skey as integer,
		isValid as boolean,
		isTruncate as boolean,
		batch_id as integer,
		createdon as timestamp,
		modifiedon as timestamp,
		ntt_name as string,
		ntt_breathingspacetypeid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> sourceSQLLookupBstFk
source(output(
		mao_pk_skey as integer,
		isValid as boolean,
		batch_id as integer,
		createdon as timestamp,
		modifiedon as timestamp,
		isTruncate as boolean,
		inss_name as string,
		inss_moneyadviserorganisationid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> sourceSQLLookupMaoFk
source(output(
		bs_status_type_pk_skey as integer,
		ntt_name as string,
		ntt_breathingspacestatustypeid as string,
		isValid as boolean,
		isTruncate as boolean,
		batch_id as integer,
		createdon as timestamp,
		modifiedon as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> sourceLookupBsStatusTypeFk
source(output(
		bs_debtor_pk_skey as integer,
		ntt_breathingspacedebtorid as string,
		ntt_addresswithheld as boolean,
		ntt_name as string,
		debtor_age_band as string,
		createdon as timestamp,
		modifiedon as timestamp,
		isValid as boolean,
		isTruncate as boolean,
		batch_id as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> sourceLookupBsDebtorFk
source(output(
		parent_cr_pk_skey as integer,
		ntt_moratoriumparentcancellationreasonid as string,
		isValid as boolean,
		isTruncate as boolean,
		batch_id as integer,
		createdon as timestamp,
		modifiedon as timestamp,
		ntt_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> sourceLookupParentCrFk
source(output(
		child_cr_pk_skey as integer,
		ntt_moratoriumchildcancellationreasonid as string,
		isValid as boolean,
		isTruncate as boolean,
		batch_id as integer,
		createdon as timestamp,
		modifiedon as timestamp,
		ntt_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> sourceLookupChildCrFk
JoinLookupChildCrFk select(mapColumn(
		batch_id = intBatchId,
		isValid = blIsValid,
		createdon = tsCreatedOn,
		modifiedon = tsModifiedOn,
		ntt_activeregisterperiodstartdate = tsNTTActiveRegisterPeriodStartDate,
		ntt_breathingspacemoratoriumid = strNTTBreathingSpaceMoratoriumId,
		ntt_closuredate = tsNTTClosureDate,
		ntt_commencementdate = tsNTTCommencementDate,
		ntt_createdfromapi = blNTTCreatedFromAPI,
		ntt_expirydate = tsNTTExpiryDate,
		ntt_removedfromregisterdate = tsNTTRemovedFromRegisterDate,
		ntt_submissiondate = tsNTTSubmissionDate,
		ntt_activeregister = blNTTActiveRegister,
		isTruncate = blIsTruncate,
		bst_fk = bst_pk_skey,
		mao_fk = mao_pk_skey,
		bs_status_type_fk = bs_status_type_pk_skey,
		bs_debtor_fk = bs_debtor_pk_skey,
		parent_cr_fk = parent_cr_pk_skey,
		child_cr_fk = child_cr_pk_skey
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectODS
SelectODS derive(ntt_breathingspacemoratoriumid = coalesce(ntt_breathingspacemoratoriumid, 'unknown'),
		createdon_dimdate_fk = iif(createdon == toTimestamp('1900-01-01 00:00:00'), -1, toInteger(toString(createdon, 'yyyyMMdd'))),
		modifiedon_dimdate_fk = iif(modifiedon == toTimestamp('1900-01-01 00:00:00'), -1, toInteger(toString(modifiedon, 'yyyyMMdd'))),
		ntt_commencementdate_dimdate_fk = iif(ntt_commencementdate == toTimestamp('1900-01-01 00:00:00'), -1, toInteger(toString(ntt_commencementdate, 'yyyyMMdd'))),
		ntt_closuredate_dimdate_fk = iif(ntt_closuredate == toTimestamp('1900-01-01 00:00:00'), -1, toInteger(toString(ntt_closuredate, 'yyyyMMdd'))),
		ntt_expirydate_dimdate_fk = iif(ntt_expirydate == toTimestamp('1900-01-01 00:00:00'), -1, toInteger(toString(ntt_expirydate, 'yyyyMMdd'))),
		ntt_submissiondate_dimdate_fk = iif(ntt_submissiondate == toTimestamp('1900-01-01 00:00:00'), -1, toInteger(toString(ntt_submissiondate, 'yyyyMMdd'))),
		ntt_activeregisterperiodstartdate_dimdate_fk = iif(ntt_activeregisterperiodstartdate == toTimestamp('1900-01-01 00:00:00'), -1, toInteger(toString(ntt_activeregisterperiodstartdate, 'yyyyMMdd'))),
		ntt_removedfromregisterdate_dimdate_fk = iif(ntt_removedfromregisterdate == toTimestamp('1900-01-01 00:00:00'), -1, toInteger(toString(ntt_removedfromregisterdate, 'yyyyMMdd')))) ~> dcolSQL
FilterODS, SelectSQLLookupBstFk join(strNTTBreathingSpaceTypeId == SelectSQLLookupBstFk@ntt_breathingspacetypeid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinSQLLookupBstFk
dcolSQL alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRowSQL
sourceSQLLookupBstFk select(mapColumn(
		bst_pk_skey,
		ntt_breathingspacetypeid
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectSQLLookupBstFk
sourceODS filter(partdist >= toDate($partdistFrom)) ~> FilterODS
sourceSQLLookupMaoFk select(mapColumn(
		mao_pk_skey,
		inss_moneyadviserorganisationid
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectLookupMaoFK
sourceLookupBsStatusTypeFk select(mapColumn(
		bs_status_type_pk_skey,
		ntt_breathingspacestatustypeid
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectLookupBsStatusTypeFk
sourceLookupBsDebtorFk select(mapColumn(
		bs_debtor_pk_skey,
		ntt_breathingspacedebtorid
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectLookupBsDebtorFk
sourceLookupParentCrFk select(mapColumn(
		parent_cr_pk_skey,
		ntt_moratoriumparentcancellationreasonid
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectLookupParentCrFk
sourceLookupChildCrFk select(mapColumn(
		child_cr_pk_skey,
		ntt_moratoriumchildcancellationreasonid
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectLookupChildCrFk
JoinSQLLookupBstFk, sourceSQLLookupMaoFk join(strNTTManagingMoneyAdviserOrganisationId == inss_moneyadviserorganisationid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinLookupMaoFk
JoinLookupMaoFk, SelectLookupBsStatusTypeFk join(strNTTBreathingSpaceStatusId == ntt_breathingspacestatustypeid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinLookupBsStatusTypeFk
JoinLookupBsStatusTypeFk, SelectLookupBsDebtorFk join(strNTTDebtorId == ntt_breathingspacedebtorid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinLookupBsDebtorFk
JoinLookupBsDebtorFk, SelectLookupParentCrFk join(strNTTParentCancellationReasonId == ntt_moratoriumparentcancellationreasonid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinLookupParentCrFk
JoinLookupParentCrFk, SelectLookupChildCrFk join(strNTTChildCancellationReasonId == ntt_moratoriumchildcancellationreasonid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinLookupChildCrFk
AlterRowSQL sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['ntt_breathingspacemoratoriumid'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sinkSQL
